section.name: Maven Word to HTML Plug-in
section.p: This plug-in allows you to write your project documentation in Microsoft Word, and generate HTML from it on a Windows platform only.

It converts Word documents to HTML using the
Microsoft® Windows® Script. You will need this installed to successfully use this plugin.
To use this plug-in, make sure the property ${maven.word2html.src.dir} has been set and run the site:generate goal.
All documents matching *.doc in the directory will be converted to HTML.
